Package ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Handler
    This interface represents a uniform interface to the application as to how Storys are stored.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationController
    This class represents the main controller for our application.
    CameraAdapter
    This function deals with calling the camera intent and dealing with its output in a fashion similar to an adapter.
    Comment
    This class represents Comments that readers add to a story.
    CommentLayoutBuilder
    This class stores all of the layout builders needed for interacting with comments.
    CommentView
    This class displays the data pertaining to comments in the form of a GUI.
    Counters
    This class is a part of the model in MVC, and acts as the model for the fighting addition of our application.
    DBHandler
    This class implements the Handler interface which specifies a contract for a class that will store and retrieve Story objects from some sort of storage.
    Decision
    This class encapsulates the data of a page's decisions which link two pages of a story together with a prompt.
    DecisionLayoutBuilder
    This class stores all of the layout builders needed for interacting with decisions.
    DecisionView
    This class builds and displays all the dialogs needed for interacting with decisions.
    EditStoryActivity
    This Activity allows a story's author to edit a story by adding adding pages, deleting pages, setting the first page, or deleting or renaming the story.
    FightingLayoutBuilder
    This class generates the GUI asociated with fighting.
    HelpDialogFactory
    This class is responsible for creating help Dialogs for use in the views of this application This class employs the Factory design pattern
    HelpPlayer
    This class is responsible for playing the audio help in the application.
    Page
    This class represents a physical page of a story -- it is part of the model of the application.
    PageController
    The controller for methods only affecting the page part of a model.
    PageView
    This generates all the GUI elements for EditStoryActivity.
    PhotoTile
    A photo Tile for use in stories.
    Story
    This class represents a story -- it is part of the model of the application in MVC style.
    StoryController
    This class handles all of the interactions with the user that cause a change in the current story in the model.
    StoryView
    This generates and displays the GUIs for ViewStoriesActivity.
    TextTile
    A text Tile for use in stories.
    Tile
    An abstract tile class that will be implemented to provide text and pictures.
    TileGsonMarshal
    Responsible for serializing and deserializing the abstract Tile class.
    TileLayoutBuilder
    This class stores all of the layout builders needed for interacting with tiles.
    TileView
    This class displays GUIs for managing tiles.
    ViewPageActivity
    The Activity in the application that is responsible for viewing and editing a page within a story.
    ViewStoriesActivity
    The main activity of the application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HandlerException
    This exception is an exception that will be thrown by Handler implementations.
